post: This is such an intriguing question, Russ. I can’t help but associating the L Shaped Markings with the L Shaped (Chevron) over the inner circle on the 1st Century Jesus Family Tomb. But I know a host of other critics will not see this relationship as a resurrection symbol. I once read on a Tabor Blog that this symbol was also used as a resurrection sign on the Mausoleums of Augustus and Tiberius. It does seem to be a first century cultural fad..
